attributes.title: If I could give it 0 stars I would
attributes.review: I think this app needs a lot of work. Most of the content is poor and should be considered spam. I have no idea how anyone could find the slightest bit of information from this app useful because it really should be considered garbage. For those people looking to find information regarding the upcoming election I would honestly go to some other third party news source that gives unbiased information. Seriously hoping that the Trump Administration finds some better alternative than this sad attempt at an app.

attributes.title: i had to become a fugitive
attributes.review: i downloaded this app right. i open the app right. my phone glitches so much and then it exploded. bro what the heck! i go to apple store to get another phone. i get it and load my i cloud data and all that jazz. my phone glitches and explodes once again. this happens again and again 9 times. then i look out my window and i see a man in a dark hoodie outside my window. he lifts up a phone with the trump app on the screen. his phone glitches and explodes immediately projectiling him 50 ft into the air and instantly killing him. he landed in my driveway. the police would think i killed him. i had to hide him and cut off all loose ends. i dragged him into my basement and threw him into my blast furnace. i could hear police sirens outside. i got all my personal belongings into my go diego go backpack, hopped over my fence and ran. because of this app i am now a fugitive.

attributes.title: gross
attributes.review: the first things they asked me was to put in my number so they can track me and send me death threats. i said NO WAY jose. anyways then they asked to send notifications and it was really rude of them to think i want to be reminded of the cheeto as president everyday. it took 20 months to download and took up all the storage in my phone and had to delete everything i had. the app grew out of my phone and shoved me out of my house. i ended up going to the hospital but he found me and flew me to the white house and killed me on top of it. this app is very dangerous donâ€™t download it.

attributes.title: Honest Review
attributes.review: I was excited to have Trump updates on my phone! Unfortunately, the app took a very long time to download  and every time I open the app it crashes. Worst app in the history of apps. Not user friendly. After several days of constant updates it let me open it without crashing. When I finally got it to work it asks for your location and very personal information to proceed, Iâ€™m concerned they will send my info in China!  I do not recommend. I deleted it and am very disappointed our president would produce such an privacy invasive app.
